snippet: If a ballot measure is approved, North Dakota would become the first state to abolish the property tax.
abstract: North Dakota's upcoming election includes a measure that, if approved by voters, will abolish the property tax entirely; controversial amendment was put forward by group arguing that the tax is unpredictable and inconsistent and not needed in a state that, in part due to wildly successful oil drilling, carries a budget reserve.
lead_paragraph: If a ballot measure is approved, North Dakota would become the first state to abolish the property tax.

headline.seo: North Dakota Voters Consider Ending Property Tax
headline.main: North Dakota Considers Eliminating Property Tax
headline.print_headline: North Dakota Considers Eliminating Property Tax
